outputs.output_descr:
TRWMP Phase I
1. Continued support for  Municipal Solid Waste collection/ Extension of  Tsunami Waste Recovery Facilities in Kota Banda Aceh, Aceh Barat & Implementation of Tsunami Waste Recovery Facilities in other impacted Districts
2. Rehabilitation of Gampong Jawa Dumpsite in Kota Banda Aceh, and potentially other dumpsites in Aceh
3. Restoration and/or creation of livelihoods in waste management and/or utilizing recovery/ recycled materials
4. Effective and efficient management, monitoring and oversight of the overall programme on behalf of the MDTFANS donor partners ( + TRWP phase 2)

TRWMP Phase I
1. Continued support for  Municipal Solid Waste collection/ Extension of  Tsunami Waste Recovery Facilities in Kota Banda Aceh, Aceh Barat & Implementation of Tsunami Waste Recovery Facilities in other impacted Districts
2. Rehabilitation of Gampong Jawa Dumpsite in Kota Banda Aceh, and potentially other dumpsites in Aceh
3. Restoration and/or creation of livelihoods in waste management and/or utilizing recovery/ recycled materials
4. Effective and efficient management, monitoring and oversight of the overall programme on behalf of the MDTFANS donor partners ( + TRWP phase 2)

project_descr: Multy Donor Trust Fund (MDTF): Waste Management Project: Initiated through the Aceh Emergency Response and Transitional Recovery.
project_title: Multy Donor Trust Fund : Waste Management Project
